Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: I’m thinking about narrowing down the whole feature. That is, instead of having the generic name “bidirectional communication”, make it “click events”. I cannot imagine anything else that we’d want to implement in the same fashion. Can you? What do you think?

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: Just use “val” here, it correlates with C’s true/false.
